2530.verse: وَنَضَعُ|And We set|97|104|11809$ٱلْمَوَٲزِينَ|the scales|109|122|11810$ٱلْقِسْطَ|(of) the justice|121|134|11811$لِيَوْمِ|for (the) Day|107|120|11812$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection,|164|177|820$فَلَا|so not|62|68|208$تُظْلَمُ|will be wronged|122|131|11813$نَفْسٌ|any soul|75|93|470$شَيْــًٔا‌ۖ|(in) anything.|110|128|472$وَإِن|And if|58|76|213$كَانَ|(there) be|88|106|913$مِثْقَالَ|weight|72|90|4002$حَبَّةٍ|(of) a seed|94|103|2361$مِّنْ|of|50|72|53$خَرْدَلٍ|a mustard|86|129|11814$أَتَيْنَا|We will bring|103|146|11815$بِهَا‌ۗ|[with] it.|79|122|1203$وَكَفَىٰ|And sufficient|111|154|4038$بِنَا|(are) We|79|101|7650$حَـٰسِبِينَ|(as) Reckoners.|124|124|11816$

2531.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|108|640$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|114|509$مُوسَىٰ|Musa|83|119|499$وَهَـٰرُونَ|and Harun|102|138|4645$ٱلْفُرْقَانَ|the Criterion|102|138|2611$وَضِيَآءً|and a light|90|108|11817$وَذِكْرًا|and a Reminder|121|330|11818$لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ|for the righteous.|136|345|34$

2533.verse: وَهَـٰذَا|And this|74|83|2989$ذِكْرٌ|(is) a Reminder|119|137|6496$مُّبَارَكٌ|blessed,|83|101|5825$أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ‌ۚ|which We (have) revealed.|199|217|5824$أَفَأَنتُمْ|Then are you|108|126|11819$لَهُۥ|of it|54|63|977$مُنكِرُونَ|rejecters?|101|101|11820$

2534.verse: ۞ وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|104|119|640$ءَاتَيْنَآ|We gave|78|108|509$إِبْرَٲهِيمَ|Ibrahim|91|121|1127$رُشْدَهُۥ|his guidance|102|132|11821$مِن قَبْلُ|before,|92|122|250$وَكُنَّا|and We were|107|122|6992$بِهِۦ|about him|85|324|204$عَـٰلِمِينَ|Well-Knowing.|113|352|11822$

2538.verse: قَالُوٓاْ|They said,|89|108|101$أَجِئْتَنَا|"Have you come to us|166|203|6516$بِٱلْحَقِّ|with the truth,|118|155|692$أَمْ|or|38|75|62$أَنتَ|you|58|95|341$مِنَ|(are) of|71|90|156$ٱللَّـٰعِبِينَ|those who play?"|133|133|11826$

2540.verse: وَتَٱللَّهِ|And by Allah|102|115|11828$لَأَكِيدَنَّ|surely, I will plan|131|156|11829$أَصْنَـٰمَكُم|(against) your idols|148|173|11830$بَعْدَ|after|52|77|1117$أَن|[that]|60|85|655$تُوَلُّواْ|you go away|105|118|1074$مُدْبِرِينَ|turning (your) backs."|165|165|7505$

2528.verse: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.

2529.verse: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers."

2530.verse: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is [even] the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant.

2531.verse: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous

2532.verse: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive.

2533.verse: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?

2534.verse: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing

2535.verse: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"

2536.verse: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."

2537.verse: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."

2538.verse: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"

2539.verse: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.

2540.verse: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
